Is Jackson-Weiss syndrome inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.",GHR,Jackson-Weiss syndrome
What are the treatments for Jackson-Weiss syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Jackson-Weiss syndrome:  - Gene
